title: Convert to tracklet with `Assemble with identity only` option cause IndexError
body:
**Describe the bug** Dear DeepLabCut team, This error is probably caused by making tracklet with the `Assemble with identity only` option enabled in multi-animal tracking with `uniquebodyparts`. **Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):** - OS: Windows10, python3.7 - DeepLabCut Version: 2.2rc2 - DeepLabCut mode: multi-animal tracking(identity=True) - GPU TYPE: CPU only **To Reproduce** 1. make multi-animal project with `identity=true` and having some `uniquebodyparts` in `config.yaml`. 2. extract, labeling frames and create training dataset, training and analyze video follow the GUI. 3. For the created pickle file, set `Assemble with identity only` to yes and run `Step2: Convert to Tracklets`. 4. See error:
TRACEBACK

```python Processing... C:\Users\Owner\2_mice-tester-2021-06-23\videos\xxxxxx.mov C:\Users\Owner\2_mice-tester-2021-06-23\videos already exists! Analyzing C:\Users\Owner\2_mice-tester-2021-06-23\videos\xxxxxxDLC_dlcrnetms5_2_miceJun23shuffle1_40000.h5 0it [00:00, ?it/s] Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\Users\Owner\pyenvs\dlc37\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\analyze_videos.py", line 424, in convert2_tracklets identity_only=self.identity_toggle.GetStringSelection() == "Yes", File "C:\Users\Owner\pyenvs\dlc37\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\predict_videos.py", line 1490, in convert_detections2tracklets ass.assemble() File "C:\Users\Owner\pyenvs\dlc37\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 721, in assemble assemblies, unique = self._assemble(data_dict, i) File "C:\Users\Owner\pyenvs\dlc37\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 628, in _assemble ass.add_joint(joint) File "C:\Users\Owner\pyenvs\dlc37\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 165, in add_joint self.data[joint.label] = *joint.pos, joint.confidence, joint.group IndexError: index 4 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 4 ```

**Expected behavior** I think it is caused by trying to add even `uniquebodyparts` to the `Assembly` in the `identity only` condition. The `Assembly` class that stores the joint is created on line 625 of `inferenceutils.py` with the size `n_multibodyparts`. ```python ass = Assembly(self.n_multibodyparts) ``` Therefore, I think it should not do `add_joint` for `uniquebodyparts`. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. (but please post the code output above, not images of code!) **Additional context** I have tried a simple trick to solve this problem. That is to add `and joint.label < self.n_multibodyparts` to line 627 of inferenceutils.py: ```python for _, group in groups: ass = Assembly(self.n_multibodyparts) for joint in sorted(group, key=lambda x: x.confidence, reverse=True): if joint.confidence >= self.pcutoff and joint.label < self.n_multibodyparts: # HERE!! ass.add_joint(joint) if len(ass): assemblies.append(ass) assembled.update(ass._idx) ``` Consider a joint with a label greater than `n_multibodyparts` to be `uniquebodyparts`, and do not do `ass.add_joint(joint)` under this condition. This fix seems to work fine for me. However, I'm not sure exactly what the correct `assemble with identity only` behavior is, so this refinement is just an idea! Thank you in advance!
